THEME_BUTTON.L: width:432px; height:56px; color:#fff; background-color:var(--main-color); font-weight:500; font-size:16px; &:hover{ &::before{content:'';position:absolute;top:0;left:0;z-index:10;opacity:0.1;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:var(--button-hover-color);} }

INPUT.SSS: width:32px; height:32px; color:#000; background-color:#F9F9FA; font-size:12px; border:1px solid #C5C6C9; &.on,&:hover{ background-color:#D4E3FF; border:1px solid #3F7FFF; }
INPUT.SS: width:46px; height:40px; color:#000; background-color:#F9F9FA; font-size:12px; border:1px solid #C5C6C9; &.on,&:hover{ background-color:#D4E3FF; border:1px solid #3F7FFF; }

INPUT.KEY_NUM_L: width:88px; height:34px; color:#000; background-color:#F9F9FA; font-size:14px; border:1px solid #C5C6C9; &.on,&:hover{ background-color:#D4E3FF; border:1px solid #3F7FFF; }
INPUT.KEY_STR: width:43px; height:46px; color:#000; background-color:#F9F9FA; padding:4px 0; align-items:end; font-size:14px; border:1px solid #C5C6C9; .key{ width:20px; height:20px; left:0; top:0; display:flex; align-items:center;justify-content:center; background-color: #EBEBEC; border-radius:0 0 3px 0; position: absolute; } &.on,&:hover{ background-color:#D4E3FF; border:1px solid #3F7FFF; color:#000; .key{ background-color: #ACC9FF; } }
